summary: Completed frontend i18n testing for AfCFTA application. All language toggle functionality is working correctly. The Production tab (Macro, Agriculture, Manufacturing, Mining) now displays correct translations in both English and French. Country names in dropdowns also translate correctly based on selected language.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All i18n translations for the Production tab (Macro, Agriculture, Manufacturing, Mining) are working correctly. The language toggle persists across all tabs. Country names in dropdowns translate correctly (e.g., 'South Africa' in English, 'Afrique du Sud' in French). The fix involved adding proper translation dictionaries (texts object with fr/en keys) to all four Production sub-components and fixing a useMemo dependency issue in EnhancedCountrySelector.
